fn.p: Chi-square (χ2) statistics using Fisher's exact test.

extracted-table.table-caption: Montreal neurological institute (MNI) coordinates of selected seed regions of interest (ROIs) which showed significant correlations between amplitude of low frequency fluctuations (ALFF) and sustained force standard deviation during precision grip in TD controls and individuals with ASD.

caption.p: Montreal neurological institute (MNI) coordinates of selected seed regions of interest (ROIs) which showed significant correlations between amplitude of low frequency fluctuations (ALFF) and sustained force standard deviation during precision grip in TD controls and individuals with ASD.

td.bold: ROIs identified from individuals with ASD

table-wrap-foot.p: Negative X values indicate locations in the left hemisphere.
All results are AlphaSim error corrected,
